arts.ttl: Why Shaun Maloney performed a U-turn to bring Glenn Whelan to Wigan Athletic
arts.sum: Shaun Maloney has revealed his desire for 'stability' was behind his U-turn which led to Glenn Whelan joining the Wigan Athletic coaching staff.

arts.ttl: Why it's now 'impossible to leave out' James Carragher - Wigan Athletic boss
arts.sum: James Carragher's 'personality and attitude' during the off-season helped to ensure it's been 'impossible to leave him out' of the Wigan Athletic starting XI.

arts.ttl: Wigan Athletic chief singles out duo for special praise after Lincoln City draw
arts.sum: Shaun Maloney insists there's 'still loads to come' from his Wigan Athletic side after drawing 0-0 at play-off chasing Lincoln City.

arts.ttl: REPORT: Lincoln City 0 Wigan Athletic 0 - Aasgaard comes closest to breaking deadlock as Tics secure Impish point
arts.sum: Thelo Aasgaard hit the post with a second-half header as Wigan Athletic had to settle for a point on the road after a stalemate at Lincoln City.

arts.ttl: Lincoln and Wigan share points after stalemate
arts.sum: Chances were at a premium, with Latics midfielder Thelo Aasgaard going closest with a second-half header that hit a post.

arts.ttl: Retro sport: Wigan Athletic in action 1980-1985
arts.sum: Here’s a blast from the past with these classic Latics photos from the 1980s.

arts.ttl: Wigan Athletic: Who makes our expected team v Lincoln City?
arts.sum: Paul Kendrick runs the rule over the Wigan Athletic squad and predicts the 11 men who Shaun Maloney will select to start at Lincoln City

arts.ttl: ‘Narrow victory’ – Lincoln City vs Wigan Athletic prediction: The72
arts.sum: The72's writers offer their Lincoln City vs Wigan Athletic prediction ahead of their League One clash on Saturday afternoon. The post ‘Narrow victory’ – Lincoln City vs Wigan Athletic prediction: The72 appeared first on The72 - Football League News.

arts.ttl: Wigan Athletic boss shares when Jonny Smith is expected to return from injury
arts.sum: Wigan Athletic boss Shaun Maloney has said Jonny Smith is a ‘couple of weeks’ away as he recovers… The post Wigan Athletic boss shares when Jonny Smith is expected to return from injury appeared first on The72 - Football League News.

arts.ttl: Wigan Athletic boss makes bullish centre-back prediction
arts.sum: Toby Sibbick has been backed to provide a 'really aggressive' challenge to Jason Kerr and Will Aimson for their centre-half spots at Wigan Athletic.
